dcterms:creator: R. Rastgoo
K. Kiani
S. Escalera
dcterms:description: The RKS-PERSIANSIGN dataset includes 10,000 RGB videos of 100 Persian signs using 10 contributors (5 women and 5 men) in a simple background with a maximum distance of 1.5 meters between the contributor and camera. There are 100 video samples for each Persian sign word.
dcterms:title: RKS-PERSIANSIGN

dcterms:creator: C. Neidle
A. Thangali
S. Sclaroff
dcterms:description: The ASLLVD dataset contains American sign words with their corresponding annotations. It includes different sample numbers in each class label, and the authors selected 100 sign categories which contain at least seven video samples.
dcterms:title: ASLLVD
